name: Mobile Health Association
overview:
The Mobile Health Association is the professional organization providing education, networking and policy advancement for the Mobile Health industry.

The Mobile Health Association is a membership organization providing networking, education and policy advancement for the mobile health ecosystem. Our members are professionals, corporations, associations, universities, health care organizations, not for profit organizations and media partners working on advancements in technology, life sciences, energy, payments and care services. We provide platforms for our membership to advance their messages through events, the Mobile Health Post news site and the Mobile Health TV channel. We provide education for professionals to advance their careers as well as the certification programs for professionals to achieve expert credentials in the industry.
